data.oai_dc:dc: Sequence information for the 5788 SNP markers and genotype information across the 271 inbred lines of sunflower used in Dowell et al. 2019 (https://doi.org/10.1093/jhered/esz013). This data is a subset of SNPs reported in Bachlava et al. 2012 (https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0029814) with additional information including gene ontology information provided in the supplement to that paper.
